TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Muhammadu_Buhari, title = Muhammadu_Buhari, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Muhammadu_Buhari} }

S.FORM: Muhammadu Buhari I 1942 a miheca saka 12 folad saka 17 a romi'ad masofoc ci Muhammadu Buhari, malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Nigeria anini i ci Muhammadu Buhari, patirengan a romi'ad i 2015 a miheca saka 5 folad saka 29 a romi'ad.
